caption.body: "The visual arts, in particular drawing and painting, have always been compelling…Whatever the medium, the challenge is always to find a unity of line, form, and proportion. Drawing, in its broadest sense, is the means by which these aims are achieved." Keith Redfern (b. 1935)  Mustard pot  c. 1963 Keith Redfern (b. 1935) London sterling silver, yew wood, ceramic liner The Pearson Silver Collection L2018.1801.002.01  Special thanks to The Pearson Silver Collection. "A Sterling Renaissance: British Silver Design 1957 to 2018" is on display, pre-security, in the International Terminal. http://bit.ly/BritishSilver
